review.reviewBody:
First time I have ever ordered from here... I'm a newbie to Langley :) 
The Special Steak and Pasta was AMAZING!!! The steak was cooked perfectly (before I opened it, I said to myself I wish I had ordered a side of mushrooms...) and when I opened the steak package THERE WERE MUSHROOMS & ONION RINGS  :) the pasta was νοστιμότατος!!!  
I've only eaten half of everything... portion size perfect!  I am extremely happy <3 
They have Exceeded my Expectations :)
Every order is messed up in some way, never seem to follow the instructions.
Best pizza I've had in a long  time. Delish! Wings were charbroiled and then tossed in the nicest terriyaki sauce. All arrived hot. I will def reccomend and order again. Thanks Andrea's!
This is my favourite restaurant, really nice staff and comforting vibes. It's very nostalgic for the 90s and the family restaurants I'd see in Disney movies.
I have been a customer of Andreas for many years and I love their food and the staff is awesome!!!!
